1 Day Doi Inthanon National Park and Nature Trail

This tour is a combination of a short 2 hour trek along a nature trail depending on the time of year either Kew Mae Pan trail (November to May) or the Pha Dok Siaw Trai (June to October) both are beautiful trails but the Kew Mae Pan is exceptionally scenic and a sightseeing tour. The 2 hour nature trails take you through one of the most beautiful rainforests in Thailand. Enjoy the scenery and sights along the easy walking trail and see majestic falls, such as Wachirathan Waterfall. Visit a Karen hilltribe village and sample their organic coffee. Visit the highest spot in Thailand (the summit of Doi Inthanon) and see the Pagodas of the King & the Queen.

Quick Facts

Price: THB 1,600
Duration: 10 hours
Meal(s): Lunch
Difficulty: Easy
Seasonal: Available All Year

More Info

Pick Up & Drop Off

Pick up from your hotel between 7.00 - 7.30 am. Drop off in Chiang Mai around 5.30 pm.

Included

Pick up and drop off from your hotel, lunch (vegan option available), water, English-speaking guide, hilltribe guide, park fees, pagoda entrance fee, and insurance.

Not Included

Extra snacks or soft drinks.

What to Bring

Wear shoes with grip suitable for trekking and climbing, swimsuit for enjoying at the waterfall.

Please support our mission by booking your trek directly with us on this site or by calling us instead of through a tour agency.

Highlights

  • Explore Doi Inthanon National Park
  • Visit a waterfall
  • See a Karen hilltribe coffee plantation and try organic coffee
  • Discover the highest point in Thailand and the King and Queen's Royal Pagodas
  • 2 hour nature trail on the breath-taking Kew Mae Pan Trail (November through May)
  • 2 hour nature trail on the beautiful Mae Klang Luang Trail (June through October)

Itinerary:

  • Depart from your hotel between 7.00 – 7.30 am.
  • Visit Wachiratharn waterfall.
  • Trek for 2 hours on a gentle nature trail through the Doi Inthanon National Park. Either the Kew Mae Pan trail (November through May) or the Pha Dok Siaw trail (June through October)
  • Visit the White Karen hill tribe village and coffee planatation. You can try some homemade, freshly brewed local coffee.
  • Stop for lunch.
  • Drive to the highest peak in Thailand - the summit of Doi Inthanon.
  • Walk around the raised walking trail and visit the shrine/stupa of King Inthanon (Chiangmai’s 7th King).
  • Visit the beautoful pagodas of the King & the Queen and enjoy scenic views.
  • Leave to arrive in Chiang Mai around 6.30 pm.

Notes:

This tour is operated by one of our partners.
